# More R plots

```{r cars, out.height = '15%', fig.height = 4, fig.width = 6, dev = 'svg'}
par(mar = c(4, 4, 1, .1))
plot(cars, pch = 19, col = 'darkgray', las = 1)
fit = lm(dist ~ 1 + speed, data = cars)
abline(fit, lwd = 2)
```
